contentBody.headMarkup:
<!-- branding stylesheets -->
<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />



<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Light.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>
<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Regular.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>
<link rel="preload" href="{ basePath }/assets/fonts/webfonts/SalesforceSans-Bold.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" fetchPriority="low"/>
<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="{basePath}/assets/favicon.ico?{versionKey}">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{basePath}/assets/css/theme2.css?{versionKey}">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/styles.css }" />

<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="{basePath}/assets/favicon.ico?{versionKey}">

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/styles.css }" />
<style>
    /* Target standard Experience Cloud logo class */
    .branding-logo {
        float: left; /* Align to left */
        width: 200px !important; /* Adjust width as needed */
        height: auto;
        max-width: 100%;
        margin-right: 20px; /* Optional spacing */
    }

    /* Optionally adjust the container (sometimes needed) */
    .site-logo, .branding-logo-container, .comm-navigation__logo, .header-logo {
        display: flex !important;
        justify-content: flex-start !important;
        align-items: center !important;
    }
     .class {
       font-size: 32px;
    }
</style>

<script type='text/javascript'>
var user;
//Listening to the Custom Event published by the LWC
window.addEventListener('userDetails', function(e){
console.log('user details: ' + JSON.stringify(e.detail));
user = e.detail;
});

//These hidden prechat parameters can be sent to the Omni Flow for different u
 window.addEventListener("onEmbeddedMessagingReady",e => {
     embeddedservice_bootstrap.prechatAPI.setHiddenPrechatFields({
"UserID": user.id,
"User_Email": user.email,
"ContactId": user.contactId  
});
 });
</script>

<script>
    document.dispatchEvent(
        new CustomEvent('experience_interaction', {
            bubbles: true,
            composed: true,
            detail: {
            name: 'set-consent',
            value: true,
        },
        })
    );
</script>
